name: Clothing Web Store
description: A mock web store using strictly HTML, CSS and VanillaJS.

name: Database Interaction App
description: A console program that accesses a database in Oracle. It takes input from the user and it creates/updates the respective attributes in the table. It also has an option to display all the rows in such table.
video: <iframe src='https://www.youtube.com/embed/SayNGKdvWOA?controls=0' frameborder='0' allow='accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture' allowfullscreen>

name: Parking App
description: This project simulates a parking complex, allowing vehicles to enter and exit the building. There are a limited amount of parking spots and the program acts accordingly. The car owners are also able to decide if they want a car wash.
